title: Did Florida's judge give very different sentences to two men whose only difference was race?
subtitle: On the basis of a piece of investigative journalism, Mimi Al-Virvi ignored some important contexts in the Chase Legletner and Lamar Lloyd cases.
author: Dan MacGuill
vclaim: Judge of the 19th Circuit of Florida Sherwood "Chip" Bauer gave a black man 26 years in prison and a white man who spent two years in the same crime under the same conditions.
